Description:
Model
Brand: RAIDMAX
Series: Meshian


Details
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Case Material: Steel / Plastic / Tempered Glass
With Power Supply: No
Side Panel Window: Yes
Dust Filters: Top


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 2
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 2
Expansion Slots: 7


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: USB3.0 x 2, HD Audio, Power, Reset, Fan LED Button


Cooling System
Fan Options: Front - 3 x 120mm /3 x 140mm
Top - 3 x 120mm /2 x 140mm
Rear - 1 x 120mm
Bottom - 2 x 120mm
Radiator Options: Front - Up to 360mm
Top - Up to 360mm
120mm Fans: Preinstalled ARGB 120mm Fans x 4pcs at the front


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 400 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 165 mm
Max PSU Length: Standard PS2 / ATX PSU ( Bottom Mounted)
Dimensions (H x W x D): 480(L) x 210(W) x 485(H)
Label: Chasis Raidmax MESHIAN X603 Lite White
